column4: upgrading to 10.4 LTS (i386), has my system not booting :( help!
where can I get help for my computer?
is it set to boot from the proper device?  ie, the ubuntu partition
My guess is yes? I upgraded (not updated, upgraded), it worked fine before the upgrade.
guessing... doesn't work so well with Ubuntu :)
i'm off to lunch, but try getting into your bootloader, reboot and hold shift, choose the right device
